page.title: 07Education.Newport School
page.content: Every year the children from the fourth year at Newport Junior School, leave the school to stay in a Youth Hostel or a hotel.This gives us a chance to look after ourselves and to be independent.The Head Mistress,Mrs. Walker and our class teacher,Mrs.Watt, lead these adventures.This year,1985, we went to Middle Head Outdoor Pursuits Centre.We were given the opportunity to rock climb and to abseil down a forty foot rock face.It was great. We are often given the opportunity to meet children from other schools when we meet them to play matches of netball or football.At the end of the Summer term we invite the fourth year children, from the junior schools that feed into Howden Comprehensive,to our Recreation field, just to make friends and play games together.Linda Moverley
